### Tender Announcement for International Trade Professional Certification and Designation Training

#### Tender Information
* **Title**: International Trade Professional Certification and Designation Training
* **Contract Reference Number**: cb-474-64453708
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: 24-253513
* **Publication Date**: 2024-02-19
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-03-06T15:00:00
* **Status**: Expired

#### Contract Details
* **Start Date**: 2024-04-01
* **End Date**: 2028-03-31
* **Regions**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Industry**: *81131500 - Methodology and Analysis services
* **Notice Type**: Advance Contract Award Notice
* **Procurement Method**: Advance contract award notice

#### Trade Agreements
* **Agreements**: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* **Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* **Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* **Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* **World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

#### Point of Contact
* **Name**: Katherine Borden
* **Email**: [katherine.borden@international.gc.ca](mailto:katherine.borden@international.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (613) 762-9277
* **Address**: 200 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, QC

#### Tender Description
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada (DFATD) is seeking to provide online training courses and workshops to prepare its trade employees for a professional certification/designation as an International Trade Professional. This certification will enable participants to have an internationally recognized title, given the global presence of the Canadian Trade Commissioner Service.
